"Would not such a meeting be too trying for him, dear Anna Mikhdylovna?" said he. "Let us wait until evening. The doctors are expect- ing a crisis." 
"But one cannot delay, Prince, at such a mo- ment! Consider that the welfare of his soul is at stake. Ah, it is awful: the duties of a Chris- tian . . ."
